Articles.Content:
Want an engine that will let you maneuver in space but takes up almost no room and weighs a tiny amount, Then come to Lucek Astro Engineering LLc for you're new Ion Thruster m-486, now in funky tie dye paint job.

Update 1:correcting mass, 1.1
pics please Looks awesome. Can't wait to use it in orbit

As much as I'd like to claim I read your post, launched the game, made a rocket, put it in space, took a photo, edited it down, uploaded it online and posted it here in under 30 s, the truth is I was working on posting a photo before you commented. Never the less thanks for the interest.
Can we eat it after the fuel is depleted?

Can we eat it after the fuel is depleted?

It looks fruit-flavored.
it looks like those old fruit juice wax bottles.
